data.name: StudentInfoText
data.value: Welcome to AxCrypt’s <label>Students Plan!</label>

data.name: StudentKeyPointHead1
data.value: Safeguard your Intellectual Property

data.name: StudentKeyPointHead2
data.value: Securely collaborate with Classmates

data.name: StudentKeyPointHead3
data.value: Secure Cloud Integration

data.name: StudentKeyPointHead4
data.value: On-the-go access

data.name: StudentKeyPointHead5
data.value: Ensure complete erasure

data.name: StudentKeyPointParagraph1
data.value: With AES-256 encryption, AxCrypt Premium ensures that your research papers, assignments, and personal notes are protected from unauthorized access. Safeguard your intellectual property and sensitive information with the most robust encryption available.

data.name: StudentKeyPointParagraph2
data.value: Effortless File Sharing with classmates and professors while maintaining confidentiality. Share encrypted files seamlessly, ensuring that only intended recipients can access your documents.

data.name: StudentKeyPointParagraph3
data.value: Automatically encrypt your files stored on popular cloud services like Google Drive, OneDrive, and Dropbox. This means you can work on your projects from anywhere, knowing your data is secure.

data.name: StudentKeyPointParagraph4
data.value: Keep your academic materials protected even on the go with our mobile apps for Android and iOS. Whether you're studying in a café or accessing your files from your dorm room, your data remains safe.

data.name: StudentKeyPointParagraph5
data.value: Easily remove files from your devices permanently, ensuring that no sensitive information is left behind or recoverable by unauthorized parties.

data.value: Student Plan

data.name: StudentOffText
data.value: Get up to 50% OFF

data.name: StudentPageDescription
data.value: As a university student, safeguarding your academic work is crucial. That's why we're excited to offer you AxCrypt Premium at an exclusive 50% discount! Our advanced encryption solutions are now more accessible, allowing you to protect your essential documents and data with ease.

data.name: TechIndusLinkLabel
data.value: AXCRYPT IN TECH

data.name: TechLinkLabel
data.value: Tech

data.name: TechnicalDetailsDescription
data.value: This section describes in detail just what AxCrypt is, what it does, and how it does it. It is mostly for technical experts, who have a good grasp on software development as well as cryptography. Information here is intended to be complete enough to build AxCrypt-compatible software for example.

data.name: TechnicalDetailsLinkLabel
data.value: Technical Details

data.name: TechnicalDetailsSourceCodeHeading
data.value: Source code

data.name: TechnicalDetailsSourceCodeText
data.value: The complete source code for the core libraries and the Windows client used to be in a mercurial repository in Bitbucket. But as of summer 2020, Bitbucket discontinued their mercurial support and we’re actively working on finding an alternative solution to make the source code easily available. For now, please contact support@axcrypt.net and we will supply the source code.

data.name: TechnicalDetailsStoredOnServerHeading
data.value: What is stored on the server?

data.name: TechnicalDetailsStoredOnServerListText1
data.value: The email address of the account.

data.name: TechnicalDetailsStoredOnServerListText2
data.value: The sign in status, number of failed sign in attempts, last time of sign in etc.

data.name: TechnicalDetailsStoredOnServerListText3
data.value: The payment status.

data.name: TechnicalDetailsStoredOnServerListText4
data.value: A RSA-4096 public key that is available for others to download in order to perform file key sharing.

data.name: TechnicalDetailsStoredOnServerListText5
data.value: One or more RSA-4096 private keys, encrypted using AxCrypt and the sign in password, so we can keep it synchronized across devices, and as a backup should a device be lost or destroyed.

data.name: TechnicalDetailsStoredOnServerText1
data.value: When an account is created, we store some basic information.

data.name: TechnicalDetailsStoredOnServerText2
data.value: If the password manager is used, we also store an AES-256 XML-encrypted file with the password records, encrypted with the sign in password.

data.name: TechnicalDetailsStoredOnServerText3
data.value: Apart from the above, we perform some logging that helps us monitor the infrastructure, and improve our support capabilities. This is detailed at privacy policy.

data.name: TechnicalDetailsV1PDFLinkLabel
data.value: AxCrypt Version 1 Algorithms and File Format

data.name: TechnicalDetailsV2PDFLinkLabel
data.value: AxCrypt Version 2 Algorithms and File Format

data.value: Other

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock011Heading1
data.value: Repeated Trials

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock011Text1
data.value: No individual or entity is allowed to take trials multiples times with same or any different id. If found, that individual or entity would be liable to pay for the services taken additional to first trial taken. If you are not complying with these terms of trials, we are authorised to suspend your plan without notice.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock0New11Heading
data.value: Refund

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock10Heading
data.value: Updates to AxCrypt

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock10Text1
data.value: We may, without prior notice, modify or update AxCrypt and by continuing to use it you automatically continue to agree to these terms.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock11Heading
data.value: Premium Trial

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock11Heading1
data.value: Premium & Business Trial

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock11Text1
data.value: We offer 30 days free trial for the AxCrypt Premium or Business plan for new users. If you don’t like the product you can cancel the subscription before the trial ends. Cancelling the subscription can be done at any time. Doing this will not affect the trial and you will still be able to use all the features that comes with Business, Premium subscription during your trial period. After the 30 days of free trial, we will charge your credit/debit cards if you haven’t cancelled your subscription.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock12Heading
data.value: Payment and renewal

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock12Text1
data.value: We will provide Premium, Password Manager or Business plan services after receiving payment. Your payment details are never sent to or stored on our servers. Your paid subscription will automatically renew at the end of the subscription period, using the initial payment method. If you want to cancel, you must do so before the end of the current subscription period. You will be downgraded to Free or Viewer version as appropriate after the last day of your current subscription period.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock12Text2
data.value: We may change the price of our paid subscriptions at any time, but it will not affect your current subscription period. Price changes will take effect at the start of your next subscription period. You accept the new price by continuing to use your paid subscription after the price change takes effect, or decline it by cancelling before it takes effect.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock12Text3
data.value: Cancelling your paid subscription may be done at any time. However, refunds are not offered. For trying out AxCrypt to see if it fits your needs, you get a free month at the start of your initial subscription.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock13Heading
data.value: Disclaimer of warranties

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock13Text1
data.value: The software is provided without absolutely any warranty.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock14Heading
data.value: Disclosure to third parties

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock14Text1
data.value: We will not disclose any information about you to any third parties without your explicit consent, unless required by law.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock15Heading
data.value: Disclosure to authorities and law enforcement

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock15Text1
data.value: In theory, we may be forced by law to disclose information to government authorities. If required by law, we will comply. Such information is by definition limited to what we actually have, i.e. statistics, access logs and encrypted private keys and password manager data. We do not know your password, nor do we know what information you have encrypted, and thus cannot disclose this even if required by law.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock15Text2
data.value: It is our belief, although it is probably not tested in the legal system, that we cannot be forced to reprogram AxCrypt in a way that would make it possible to intercept your passwords to disclose your information. If this would happen then, we will do our best within our legal rights to make this known, possibly by shutting down the service as a last resort.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock16Heading
data.value: Intellectual property

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock16Text1
data.value: “AxCrypt” is recorded in the Register of European Union trademarks. We exclusively own all right, title, and interest in and to the software and service, including all associated intellectual property rights.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock17Heading
data.value: Our Responsibilities and Liability

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock17Text1
data.value: We are only liable for direct damages, never indirect damages. If we lose or disclose information, we are only liable for direct costs to recover it, reconstruct it or invalidate it, never for any other costs.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock17Text2
data.value: We aim keep our services available at all times, but are not responsible for unavailability due to issues outside of our control. We keep daily server backups up in a separate location.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock17Text3
data.value: We are only liable for any damage you can show is due to negligence by us. We are not liable for any inherent weaknesses that may be discovered in the security technology used.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock17Text4
data.value: Your information is kept confidential by the use of standardized strong encryption methods, described at Security, Technical Details and in the source code. We do not guarantee that you choose a sufficiently strong password.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock17Text5
data.value: We only provide AxCrypt and are never responsible for any illegal or fraudulent actions taken by others using it. As a user, you are entirely responsible for your actions using AxCrypt. We are never liable for damage that could have been prevented by timely backup or caused by forgotten passwords.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock17Text6
data.value: Our liability can never exceed the amount paid for the service.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock17Text7
data.value: Our website may contain links to other websites. Those websites are only provided to be used as a reference and we are not responsible for any content there.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock18Heading
data.value: Dispute and validity

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock18Text1
data.value: These Terms of Use shall be interpreted under Swedish law. Should you wish to take legal action against us, you must do so in a court of law in Stockholm, Sweden.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock18Text2
data.value: The English version of this agreement governs in case of dispute. Any translations are provided for convenience only.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock18Text3
data.value: If any part of this agreement is found to be invalid, it does not invalidate any other part of the agreement, and the new interpretation must be as close to the original as allowed.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock18Text4
data.value: Copyright © 2025 AxCrypt AB, All rights reserved.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock18Text5
data.value: Technical highest priority and priority email support are provided. We do not guarantee to solve all problems.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock1Heading
data.value: License

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock1Text1
data.value: AxCrypt is made and marketed by AxCrypt AB, Birger Jarlsgatan 58, 114 29 Stockholm, Sweden, company registration number 556967-6181, EU VAT registration number SE556967618101.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock1Text2
data.value: AxCrypt AB provides downloadable software and online services collectively called “AxCrypt” for protecting confidentiality using strong encryption. We do so under these no-nonsense terms, avoiding lengthy legal wording. Legal representatives must interpret the intent and spirit of these terms.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock1Text3
data.value: AxCrypt is licensed to you under these Terms of Use. By using AxCrypt, you confirm that you agree with this. You may be an individual or any form of legally recognized organization. Some plans are only available for individuals or organizations.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock1Text4
data.value: We reserve the right to change these terms at any time without prior notice. English is the official language of AxCrypt, any translations are only for convenience and never constitute commitments by AxCrypt.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock2Heading
data.value: Services Provided

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock2Text1
data.value: AxCrypt performs local encryption and decryption of files, and server-based encryption and decryption of encryption keys and optionally a password manager.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock3Text1
data.value: AxCrypt Viewer is available for all, without cost. The plan enables you to view and decrypt files, and to view but not modify data in the password manager.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock3Text2
data.value: Technical support may be provided depending on availability.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock4Heading
data.value: Free

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock4Text1
data.value: AxCrypt Viewer is available for all macOS and mobile users, without cost. The plan enables you to view and decrypt files, and to view but not modify data in the password manager.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock4Text2
data.value: AxCrypt Free is available for all Windows users without cost with the open-source version of AxCrypt 2.1 that is licensed under GPL, version 3. In addition to the Viewer plan, updating of existing and encryption of new files using AES-128 is supported.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock5Heading
data.value: Premium

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock5Text1
data.value: AxCrypt Premium is available to purchase for all private individuals only. Not ideal for professional use.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock5Text2
data.value: AxCrypt Premium provides extended features in addition to the Free plan as specified on our Pricing page.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock5Text3
data.value: In the case of Premium subscription expired, you will be downgraded to Free or Viewer as appropriate.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock5Text4
data.value: Technical priority email support is provided. We do not guarantee to solve all problems.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock6Heading
data.value: Business

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock6Text1
data.value: AxCrypt Business is available to purchase for companies and organizations only. It provides extended features in addition to the other plans as specified on our Pricing page.It also includes a self-service management system to allocate licenses to members.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock6Text2
data.value: If your Business subscription runs out, you will fall back to Free or Viewer as appropriate.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock6Text3
data.value: Technical highest priority email support is provided. We do not guarantee to solve all problems.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock7Heading
data.value: Software License

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock7Text1
data.value: AxCrypt Free 2.1 for Windows is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 3 or later version as published by the Free Software Foundation.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock7Text2
data.value: AxCrypt Viewer, Premium, Password Manager and Business are only licensed under these Terms of Use, not GPL. You agree not to copy, modify, edit, adapt, reproduce, or take any actions that could alter our software except as required for normal use. You are not allowed to redistribute or resell AxCrypt unless you are our authorised reselling partner.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock7Text3
data.value: For more information visit - https://www.axcrypt.net/information/reseller

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock8Heading
data.value: Your Responsibilities

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock8Text1
data.value: You agree to use AxCrypt only for purposes that are legal, and never in any way that could cause us legal liability or cause problems for others.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock8Text2
data.value: If you are not complying with these Terms of Use, we may suspend or end your paid plan without notice.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock9Heading
data.value: Personal Information

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock9Text1
data.value: When you register as an individual, we do not require any personal information from you, except a working email address. For companies and organizations we require an address and ask for an optional EU VAT number.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlock9Text2
data.value: See our Privacy Policy for details of what and how we process, accepting these Terms of Use also means accepting our privacy policy.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlockAxcryptPlanH1Text1
data.value: AxCrypt provides different types of subscription plans: AxCrypt Viewer, AxCrypt Free, AxCrypt Premium, AxCrypt Password Manager and AxCrypt Business. Plans are offered at our discretion on select platforms.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlockAxcryptPlanHeading
data.value: AxCrypt Plans

data.name: TermsOfUseBlockAxcryptPlanHeading1
data.value: AxCrypt Plans

data.name: TermsOfUseBlockMicroPayH1Text1
data.value: While signing up for the trial, to validate your credit/debit card, AxCrypt will charge you a minimum amount depending on the currency you are paying in. Once the credit/debit card is validated, we will initiate the refund of the charged amount immediately, but depending upon your bank it might take 8-10 business days to reflect in the source of the payment.

data.name: TermsOfUseBlockMicroPayHeading1
data.value: One-time refundable charge

data.name: TermsOfUseBlockNew11Text1
data.value: No refund will be provided if you haven’t cancelled your subscription during the trial period of 30 days. Refund will be given only under certain technical circumstances. We reserve the right to withdraw or modify such offers at any time without prior notice.

data.name: TermsOfUseDescription
data.value: These are the terms of use for AxCrypt

data.name: TermsOfUsePwdmngrText2

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_BSALP_Text3
data.value: Our customers outsource the installation and operation of their IT environment to us. It is therefore extremely important that this information is protected in the best possible way and with the most up-to-date methods. AxCrypt helps us to work with a high level of protection but still in a simple and efficient way.

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_DCDCIST_Text6
data.value: Nous avions non seulement un besoin interne, mais nous cherchions également une solution solide pour nos clients afin de protéger nos données en les chiffrant, les rendant ainsi inutilisables en cas de vol. epuis de longues années, nous utilisions la version gratuite d'AxCrypt, ce qui nous a décidés à passer à la version payante est la possibilité d'utiliser AxCrypt en réseau, c'est-à-dire d'accéder à plusieurs à nos données toutes en les gardant chiffrées. Nous avons déjà chiffré toutes nos données administratives, nous allons maintenant chiffrer toutes nos données techniques. Nous sommes satisfaits d'avoir choisi AxCrypt comme solution de chiffrement, car de plus son tarif est très correct en rapport à la sécurité apporté !

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_DLHISG_Text5
data.value: AxCrypt is a very easy to use and user friendly encryption software that helps us to encrypt our sensitive files and folders thereby achieving regulatory compliance.

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_DPCVBA_Text1
data.value: Top solution. There [is] some sensitive information (personnel files, board information) [that] needs to be better protected within the organization. AxCrypt allows [us] to transfer this type of sensitive information by e-mail and to store this information on company drives. Once installed, AxCrypt is perfectly usable for all stakeholders involved. Different security groups (HR/Board/...) could be created.

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_DPECN_Text11
data.value: I have been using AxCrypt for many years, it gives me peace of mind that sensitive information is protected, and that when we delete any information that is no longer required, it is done in a secure and reliable way. The product integrates very well and becomes an easy to use extension of the operating system.!

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_DPECN_Text9
data.value: AxCrypt has been wonderful for meeting all of the encryption needs of my small business. As a company working in the mental healthcare space, data safety and security are of paramount importance to us, and we have found AxCrypt's product to be a powerful and effective yet user-friendly solution. !

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_EDTDIPTSAS_Text2
data.value: We were seduced by the ergonomics of the product and its ease of use. It helped us to secure (encrypt) our important and confidential documents. The key sharing functions allow us to share the decryption with other accounts easily. The business version allows a very simple and practical management of accounts and licenses

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_IACSCA_Text10
data.value: AxCrypt allows me to protect any type of file (without the obligation of specific formats even in the storage of passwords) in a simple and safe way and to access my data from any device. but above all I can only share the data access keys with my team and not the entire file or copies of data.!

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_JSMM_Text8
data.value: We were looking for a way to store backups of sensitive financial data with one of our cloud providers and not risk exposure to their employees or outside forces. We decided that encrypting the backups before moving them to the cloud platform would solve that problem. However, the encryption process needed to be simple and easy to do or it would not be done. Furthermore, we wanted a safety net in case that person left the company and left us with encrypted files. AxCrypt provided an encryption solution that is super easy to use, and with the company account, we can implement a master key which will allow IT to decrypt any files in case of problems arising from users leaving encrypted files or forgetting passwords. Our financial person now happily goes about her job without having to wrestle with an onerous encryption process to provide the needed security. !

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_JTJT_Text7
data.value: My translation agencies require me to encrypt all documents (source and translation). AxCrypt provides a convenient, user-friendly way to do this. !

data.name: TSTMNL_Business_WREGNSA_Text4
data.value: We were looking for a simple encryption tool that we could roll out to our users without having to provide a lot of training. AxCrypt just did that for us. Outside of an initial \"how to\" document that I typed up in about a few minutes, I don’t have to provide much support to the users. AxCrypt makes that so easy.

data.name: TSTMNL_Home_GreenGeeks_Text4
data.value: .. as far as overall paid services go, you will be hard-pressed to find anything better.

data.name: TSTMNL_Home_PCMag_Text1
data.value: AxCrypt Premium makes encryption simple enough for any user, and it even offers public key cryptography for secure sharing of encrypted files.

data.name: TSTMNL_Home_TechDogs_Text5
data.value: A handy and easy-to-use file encryption and folder encryption tool, Axcrypt works for android, Windows and iOs.

data.name: TSTMNL_Home_TechRader_Text2
data.value: AxCrypt’s plainclothes approach makes encrypting files a breeze.

data.name: TSTMNL_Home_TechRader_Text3
data.value: AxCrypt is an inexpensive and effective encryption tool .. you’re in for a cheap and worthwhile file encryption software.

data.name: TSTMNL_Home_TechRader_Text6
data.value: …AxCrypt is quite easy to use. It is also available in 13 languages which is really good for a lot of my students because many of them have English as a second language and they also need to work with a lot of people all over the globe…

data.name: TSTMNL_Industries_ESFCIC_Text3
data.value: Encryption works. Properly implemented strong crypto systems are one of the few things that you can rely on.

data.name: TSTMNL_Industries_PCMAGBEES_Text4
data.value: AxCrypt makes everything about encryption simple, so you shouldn’t be surprised to learn that it even makes PKI exchange of secure data simple(…) For these reasons, AxCrypt joins CertainSafe as an Editors’ Choice for encryption.

data.name: TSTMNL_Industries_TCA_Text2
data.value: Without encryption, you and I wouldn't be able to do our banking online. We wouldn't be able to buy things online, because your credit cards - they've probably been ripped off anyway, but they would be ripped off left and right every day if there wasn't encryption.

data.name: UsageOtherText
data.value: Other

data.name: UsageTipsAnonymousFileHeading
data.value: Anonymous file names

data.name: UsageTipsAnonymousFileText
data.value: In many cases, just the filename is enough to violate privacy. As a AxCrypt Premium user, you can rename secured files from the right-click menu. The file will be given a completely anonymous name, but the original name is restored when you decrypt or open the file. It is also visible in the full AxCrypt application window.

data.name: UsageTipsBackupsHeading
data.value: Backups

data.name: UsageTipsBackupsText1
data.value: Do you do your backups to CD’s or DVD’s, the cloud, or just to files on another hard-disk using backup programs or perhaps WinZip? If you secure the backup-archive with AxCrypt, you can then store the backup or file in any place, without fear of your privacy being violated should it get lost.

data.name: UsageTipsBackupsText2
data.value: Store a copy of the standalone version of AxCrypt with your backup, and you are independent of an AxCrypt installation when you need to recover.

data.name: UsageTipsConfidentialDataHeading
data.value: Condifential data in cloud storage services

data.name: UsageTipsConfidentialDataText1
data.value: Secure your documents with AxCrypt and be assured of preserved confidentiality from your PC to the cloud service and back to your PC.

data.name: UsageTipsConfidentialDataText2
data.value: There are many web-services that allow you to upload documents, such as project services and similar. If you feel uncomfortable uploading sensitive information there, regardless of the providers assurances, secure the documents.

data.name: UsageTipsConfidentialEmailHeading
data.value: Confidential email

data.name: UsageTipsConfidentialEmailText1
data.value: A quick and easy method to communicate between two parties. Use AxCrypt to send private email messages.

data.name: UsageTipsConfidentialEmailText2
data.value: Write the initial message using Notepad, WordPad or Microsoft Word. Secure the result, add the recipient to the team member list and send it to the other party.

data.name: UsageTipsConfidentialEmailText3
data.value: The other party will now be able to open and edit the message directly, respond etc, and then reply and attach the automatically updated secure file in a quick and convenient manner.

data.name: UsageTipsConfidentialEmailText4
data.value: This is not quite as easy as regular mail – but not far from it – and most approaches instead require encrypting and decrypting using the clipboard with cut and paste.

data.name: UsageTipsDescription
data.value: Here you can learn what AxCrypt is made for and also find different situations where other users like you have found AxCrypt useful.

data.name: UsageTipsHideShowHeading
data.value: Hide/show the .axx extension

data.name: UsageTipsHideShowText1
data.value: Normally, AxCrypt files will display the .axx extension or not, depending on your global Windows settings. This behavior may be changed by modifying the Windows registry.

data.name: UsageTipsHideShowText2
data.value: AxCrypt does not implement any configuration settings to keep things simple, but if you really want this, you can modify the registry manually. If you do not know how to do this, you should probably refrain as the full implications may not be clear then.

data.name: UsageTipsLinkLabel
data.value: Usage Tips

data.name: UsageTipsMakingArchivesHeading
data.value: Making archives of secured files

data.name: UsageTipsMakingArchivesText1
data.value: AxCrypt does not support storing many files in an archiver, like WinZip. This is for a reason – because WinZip (and Windows XP or later Compressed Folders) already does it so well!

data.name: UsageTipsMakingArchivesText2
data.value: So, simply create your .zip-file, secure whatever you want to be there in it with AxCrypt, and then move it to the .zip-file. The archive can now be opened in WinZip or in a Compressed Folder view, and you can work with the archive as usual, including opening, editing, adding and deleting individual files.

data.name: UsageTipsNetworksHeading
data.value: Networks

data.name: UsageTipsNetworksText1
data.value: When you secure your data with AxCrypt, it’s never seen on the network, the server or backups in the clear.

data.name: UsageTipsNetworksText2
data.value: When you store a document on a Local Area Network-server, the data is usually stored in clear-text there, even when access controls are in place, accessible to all system-administrators as well as others who by chance or mistake happen to get read-access.

data.name: UsageTipsNetworksText3
data.value: The data also travels the network in the clear, easily sniffable by anyone on the same network segment. Backups are also seldom secured, so anyone gaining access to a backup-tape has potential access, regardless of the access controls enforced on the server.

data.name: UsageTipsNetworksText4
data.value: All of these cases are handled when the data is secured with AxCrypt.

data.name: UsageTipsPersonalPrivacyHeading
data.value: Personal privacy

data.name: UsageTipsPersonalPrivacyListItem1
data.value: Secure your files – private letters, medical & financial information, correspondence – stored on a local hard disk or network computer.

data.name: UsageTipsPersonalPrivacyListItem2
data.value: Keep remotely stored files secure (within the limits of your password). AxCrypt will, within the limits of your password, keep remotely stored files secure. For files on your local hard-disk there are many caveats not due to the security of AxCrypt as such. Please see the section on local PC security.

data.name: UsageTipsPersonalPrivacyListItem3
data.value: Simply right-click a file and secure it with AxCrypt.

data.name: UsageTipsPreDistributionHeading
data.value: Pre-distribution

data.name: UsageTipsPreDistributionText1
data.value: Some information should be confidential up to a certain time, and then it’s not. It might be a movie trailer, a quarterly financial report or something similar. Secure your file – document, movie trailer or report, distribute it by any means and be assured that it’s unreadable until a time when you choose to release the information.

data.name: UsageTipsPreDistributionText2
data.value: Information that must be prepared ahead of time, and is beneficial to have the distribution done beforehand – even though it must not be disclosed until a certain time. Use AxCrypt to secure the document, for example the PDF of the financial report. You can then distribute it by any means, hours and days ahead of time, the information is out there but unreadable. When it’s time to disclose, simply publish the password used. This reduces peak server loads and eases distribution.

data.name: UsageTipsSecuringFoldersHeading
data.value: Securing entire folders

data.name: UsageTipsSecuringFoldersText1
data.value: AxCrypt secures files, individually. However, you can designate folders as ‘secured’. The folders will be monitored for new files, and AxCrypt will secure all new files with a single click, or when you sign out.

data.name: UsageTipsSecuringFoldersText2
data.value: You can also select multiple files, including all files in a folder, to be secured in a single operation. They still remain individual files, and the folder itself is not secured, just the files in it.

data.name: UsageTipsTargetUseHeading
data.value: Target use

data.name: UsageTipsTargetUseListItem1
data.value: Share and work with stored documents and email attachments securely.

data.name: UsageTipsTargetUseListItem2
data.value: Seamlessly integrate and easily share and store sensitive files in you document sharing service, intranet or file server. If your documents reside on a document sharing service, intranet or file server AxCrypt is especially well suited and will usually seamlessly integrate, and make sharing and storing sensitive data as easy as not protecting it.

data.name: UsageTipsTargetUseListItem3
data.value: Send secured files via email as regular attachments. To send secure email, add the recipient as allowed to open the file and, then send your secured files as regular attachments. With AxCrypt sign in and the double-click edit feature even many turns over e-mail is as easy as without security.

data.name: UsageTipsTargetUseListItem4
data.value: Keep remotely stored files secure (within the limits of your password). AxCrypt will, within the limits of your password, keep remotely stored files secure. For files on your local hard-disk there are many caveats not due to the security of AxCrypt as such. Please see the section on local PC security.

data.name: UsageTipsTargetUseListItem5
data.value: For the programmers and system administrators, AxCrypt provides a command-line interface easy to use from any other programming language on the Windows platform that can execute another program, including .bat files.

data.name: UsageTipsTargetUseListItem6
data.value: Developers can integrate AxCrypt by incorporating the .NET core library which has a programmatic API that is easy to use. Get the source code by contacting support@axcrypt.net.

data.name: WelcomeMailBody0Html
data.value: Welcome to AxCrypt!

data.name: WelcomeMailBody1Html
data.value: We're really happy that you have signed up! To make you feel really welcome, We're giving you the chance to try our Premium functions for 30 days for free. Just start your trial at any time from the AxCrypt app.

data.name: WelcomeMailBody2Html
data.value: With AxCrypt Free or AxCrypt Premium, you can secure your files in a truly easy way. Encrypting your files and entire folders is just a click away. Working with the encrypted files is just as easy too!

data.name: WelcomeMailSubject
data.value: Welcome to AxCrypt!

data.name: WelcomeToAxCrypt
data.value:
Welcome to AxCrypt!
Using AxCrypt is really easy. Start with the main window, or use double-click and right-click in Windows Explorer for fully integrated use.
To encrypt your first files, click the + icon in the toolbar and select them.
For more information, click OK to open a web browser to our web site.

data.name: WelcomeToAxCryptForMac
data.value:
Welcome to AxCrypt for Mac!
Using AxCrypt is really easy. Start with the main window, or use double-click in Finder.
To encrypt your first files, click the + icon in the toolbar and select them.
For more information, click OK to open a web browser to our web site.

data.name: WixHelpHeader
data.value: Setup Help

data.name: WixHelpText
data.value:
/install | /repair | /uninstall | /layout [directory] - installs, repairs, uninstalls or creates a complete local copy of the bundle in directory. Install is the default.
/passive | /quiet - displays minimal UI with no prompts or displays no UI and no prompts. By default UI and all prompts are displayed.
/norestart - suppress any attempts to restart. By default UI will prompt before restart. /log log.txt - logs to a specific file. By default a log file is created in %TEMP%.
data.comment: The /install, /uninstall and all other /xxxxxx shold NOT BE TRANSLATED
